Description: Part of the body of a cream-coloured pottery vessel, perhaps a wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is painted cream, burnished and elaborated with polychrome painted decoration: lotus-flower-petal motifs, in black and red, and a black label bearing a white-painted hieroglyphic inscription beneath.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393396) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393396)
